name: test_e2e_with_logs[294_NOSQL_REDIS_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `NOSQL_REDIS_002` |
| **Name** | Redis CONFIG GET disclosure |
| **Category** | NOSQL_EXTENDED |
| **Subcategory** | redis |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `CONFIG GET *`
- **Encoded**: `CONFIG%20GET%20*`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~5000ms
- **Timestamp**: 08:19:46.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `MongoDB NoSQL injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX Emerging Threat] Redis command injection test_id=NOSQL_REDIS_002-1768119586980-qy227q pattern_id=NOSQL_REDIS_002 uri=/?q=CONFIG%20GET%20* client=127.0.0.1` |
| **Rule Match** | ❌ Mismatch |

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX Emerging Threat] Redis command injection test_id=NOSQL_REDIS_002-1768119586980-qy227q pattern_id=NOSQL_REDIS_002 uri=/?q=CONFIG%20GET%20* client=127.0.0.1
